casebody.data:
98-3196 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE of Louisiana v. Demetris FRANKLIN. No. 98-KH-3196. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

*876IN RE: Franklin, Demetris; — Defendants); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of East Baton Rouge 19th Judicial District Court Div. “K” Number 8-96-457; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Number KA97 2952

Denied.

LEMMON, J. not on panel.
